title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at HCA Houston Healthcare Southeast
Interview Descriptions: Wonderful interactive , they made me feel very relaxed and comfortable, the interview started with introductions and then I was asked to tell a little about myself and my clinical experience as a new grad. I was asked some behavioral questions as well
Interview Questions: Tell us about a difficult patient you had to care for and how you were able to manage the situation

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at HCA Houston Healthcare Southeast
Interview Descriptions: The interview for a PACU nurse position was AWFUL. Everyone seemed super cold and disinterested. When I got out of the interview, I saw I received a rejection email at 2:30 PM. My interview started at 2:45 PM. I have tried to contact the recruiter twice with no response. SO unprofessional.
Interview Questions: Tell us about a time you implanted change within your unit

title: Tech Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at HCA Houston Healthcare Southeast (Pasadena, TX) in Oct 2017
Interview Descriptions: Initially applied on their website, a few days later was contacted by the hiring manager for an interview which they had setup in the next few days. overall the process was rather quickly. The interview was a panel style interview. The entire interview was a mix of asking about my current work and any aspiration and critiquing my resume and education skills. Most of the panel seemed friendly but a few came off as a bit aggressive. Overall was more of an interrogation than asking about joining a team to defeat a common goal
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years

title: BHT Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at HCA Houston Healthcare Southeast (Houston, TX) in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: It was very interesting having an interview where there were 3 people at a time asking you questions about working here id never had an interview process go like that. But it ended up being great
Interview Questions: What do you consider a reasonable excuse to not come to work

title: PTA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at HCA Houston Healthcare Southeast (Pasadena, TX) in Jul 2015
Interview Descriptions: 4 people. Board room type. Asked questions about other previous rotations. Typical questions included do we know more about the company, what was the conflict that happen at a physical therapy settinf

title: Unit Secretary Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at HCA Houston Healthcare Southeast (Pasadena, TX) in Apr 2015
Interview Descriptions: I met with the office manager. We went into her office and she asked me about my experience and my availability schedule. She then went into a discussion of what they were looking for and their expectations.
Interview Questions: What schedule are you looking for?

title: Medical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at HCA Houston Healthcare Southeast (Pasadena, TX) in May 2014
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and included a resume and cover letter. About a week or so went by and I received a phone call to come in for an interview. I went in for an interview that was brief and normal. After the interview, I received a call from HR. They made me an offer and I had to go take a drug screen and then come in to sign the offer.
Interview Questions: ....tell me about yourself and background.....strengths and weaknesses etc.

title: Emergency Department RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at HCA Houston Healthcare Southeast (Houston, TX) in Dec 2013
Interview Descriptions: Was interviewed via webcam over a long distance.  Both interviewers were professional.  One of the more pleasant interviews over the years.  In the end, received an immediate offer of employment.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at HCA Houston Healthcare Southeast (Pasadena, TX) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: Spoke to HR, got interview, spoke to director of unit, director spoke to HR then was hired.
Interview Questions: How did you decide to be a nurse?

title: Patient Access Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at HCA Houston Healthcare Southeast (Pasadena, TX) in Apr 2011
Interview Descriptions: I had a phone interview. They asked if I had ever worked in a hospital before? If I ever handle a large crowd of people? If I ever had to register a disgruntled patient?
Interview Questions: If I was a fruit and someone wanted to eat me what would I do?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at HCA Houston Healthcare Southeast (Roseville, CA) in Feb 2011
Interview Descriptions: the recruiter had seen my resume online and called me for interview
Interview Questions: always scenerio questions what would you do in this or that situation
